Mayor and City Council

Find who represents you on the Grand Prairie City Council, how to participate in City Council meetings, and information on upcoming city elections

City Council Meetings

View City Council meeting schedule, agendas, and how to watch online. City Council meetings are open to the public and citizen input is welcome.

Find upcoming meetings for City Council Committees and learn more about each committee.

You can view the City of Grand Prairie's full municipal code through the Municode website.

City Departments

A to Z listing of the City of Grand Prairie's Departments

City Secretary

The City Secretary's Office administers city elections, is the custodian of city records and coordinates board and commission appointments.

City Manager's Office

The City Manager’s Office runs the day-to-day business of the city, presents policy proposals for City Council consideration and carries out policy direction set by the City Council.

Find city election information and election notices.

Accountability and financial transparency are priority at the City of Grand Prairie. The following financial information is provided to citizens to maintain accountability.
